Hello Polychronis,

The concord consortium folks have used it for their own applets; you
should check with them.  There's also some testing that was done to
check the hysteresis/offset: cjb might know more about that.

http://www.javalobby.org/java/forums/t85296.html#92069894

SJ

> Is there any code on this?
